process_object_line ( $  ProcessingString,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'object_line'.

Parameters:
$ProcessingString - Processing string.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
Processed string.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 136 of file context_set_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'object_line' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->MacroSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              $this->MacroSettings->set_undefined( 'header' , 'object_line_header.tpl' );
                              $this->MacroSettings->set_undefined( 'footer' , 'object_line_footer.tpl' );
                              
                              $PackageName = $this->MacroSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' );
                              $PackageVersion = $this->MacroSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
                              $Package = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
                              
                              $this->skip_call_params_validation( true );
                              $Code = $Package->view( $this->MacroSettings );
                              $this->skip_call_params_validation( false );
                              
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{object_line:$MacroParameters}" , $Code , $ProcessingString );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

$  ProcessingString,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'options'.

$ProcessingString - Processing string.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.

Processed string.

Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 196 of file context_set_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'options' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->MacroSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              $Name = $this->MacroSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
                              $Value = $Options->get_setting( $Name , '' );
                              
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{options:$MacroParameters}" , $Value , $ProcessingString );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
